espeak-ng/espeak-ng

open source text-to-speech engine for 100+ languages

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • speech-to-speech pipeline using open models for voice detection, transcription, language modeling, and speech synthesis
  • open source text-to-speech model built by inverting Whisper, supports voice cloning and multilingual output
  • open-weight text-to-speech model for fast, natural voice synthesis
  • Text-to-speech engine for long-form audio
  • Speech-to-text model for audio transcription, translation, and language detection
  • Text-to-speech library with advanced models in 17 languages (legacy models in 1100+), and tools for custom voice training
  • LLM-powered text-to-speech with voice cloning and bilingual support
  • Converts text to speech across languages
  • open-source text-to-speech with voice cloning and emotion control
  • open source audio model for expressive speech and voice cloning
